objects.text:
• Iconic black, white & olive colorway
• Premium leather upper construction
• Limited time exclusive availability
Limited time offer. Grab it before it's gone!

Offer valid until stocks last.
Use code: EARLYAIR at checkout

banner_details:
This banner is a high-contrast promotional layout split into two vertical halves. The left side features textual content layered over a dark gradient background, while the right side presents a semi-transparent overlay behind a large product image. The top area introduces a bold promotional text (ID: "tagline" and "heading") with a modern and dynamic typeface, followed by the product name (ID: "subheading"). Below it, a feature list (ID: "description") highlights key product benefits. The pricing text (ID: "price") stands out in a distinctive typeface. A call-to-action button (ID: "cta_button" and "cta") and terms (ID: "terms") are aligned below. Dotted dividing lines, soft circular accents, and minimalistic strokes enhance the visual hierarchy. Overall, this design conveys exclusivity with a sense of urgency.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Charcoal: #121212
- Slate Gray: #2A2A2A
- Army Olive: #9C9C7E
- Pale Olive: #797A60
- White: #FFFFFF
- Black: #000000
product_color: This product image showcases a stylish sneaker with a refined and balanced color palette. Dominant tones include olive green (#8A8C5F), deep black (#2C2C2C), crisp white (#F6F6F6), and muted beige (#EDE8DD). The colors are strategically placed for contrast and visual appeal—black outlines the top and front panels, white creates a clean mid-body base, and olive green subtly enhances the swoosh, heel, and outsole. The muted tones blend smoothly, yet each element stands out due to clean stitching and structural highlights. For the advertisement banner, using this sophisticated palette will evoke a bold yet minimal aesthetic, emphasizing modern, street-style fashion.
